problem.description: 다음 코드를 읽고 실행 결과를 예측하세요.
problem.input: apple1 = Apple(3, 4) apple2 = Apple(0, 0) result = apple1.maple(apple2) print(result)
problem.solution: def maple(self, mango_info): return math.sqrt((self.dog - mango_info.dog)**2 + (self.cat - mango_info.cat)**2)

problem.description: 다음 코드를 읽고 실행 결과를 예측하세요.
problem.input: apple1 = Apple(1, 2) apple2 = Apple(4, 6) result = apple1.maple(apple2) print(result)
problem.solution: def maple(self, mango_info): return math.sqrt((self.dog - mango_info.dog)**2 + (self.cat - mango_info.cat)**2)

problem.solution: def maple(self, mango_info): return math.sqrt((self.dog - mango_info.dog)**2 + (self.cat - mango_info.cat)**2)

problem.description: 다음 코드를 읽고 실행 결과를 예측하세요.
problem.input: apple1 = Apple(-1, -1) apple2 = Apple(2, 3) result = apple1.maple(apple2) print(result)
problem.solution: def maple(self, mango_info): return math.sqrt((self.dog - mango_info.dog)**2 + (self.cat - mango_info.cat)**2)
